name: @wessberg/ts-config
description: Shared rules for Typescript and tslint, used across my OSS projects.

scripts.readme:refresh: npm run changelog:generate && npm run readme:changelog
scripts.commit:readme: npm run readme:refresh && git commit -am "Updated changelog" --no-verify || true
scripts.publish:major: npm run commit:readme && npm version major && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run commit:readme && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm run commit:readme && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
